body:
Certified hood classic.

But yeah, it is rape. The problem is that older futanari works usually never got the rape tag because it was scary enough to have girls with both sexes back then. 
Still, knowing that this are classic Futanari, you don't have to feel too bad for them, because they were designed to have unlimited sex and sex was seen as something essential for them (they are always in heat).

This was way too rapey tbh. All of her crying and screaming was a total turn-off. It made me feel dirty. I wanted her to call the police. She only came around at the end because her spirit had already been destroyed and she didn't have the willpower to resist anymore. This manga should have both a mindbreak tag and a rape tag IMHO.
I wonder if this artist is still active?
